objectives.name: Identify construction gap

objectives.name: Fix construction gap

approaches_tried.reason: Proof strategy is correct but requires G psi at future entries
Too complex - simplified to show signature correctness first

blocking_issue: The construction at lines 505-511 only propagates psi to future times, not G psi. The supporting lemmas require G psi to be present at future entries so that psi can be derived via temp_t_future.
recommended_next_step: Modify buildSeedAux to add seed4 := seed3.addToAllFutureTimes famIdx timeIdx phi (for G psi) after adding psi
key_findings: G psi NOT propagated to future times in current construction
Semantically correct to propagate G psi: if G psi at t, then G psi at t' > t
Fix requires modifying buildSeedAux positive G/H cases
